meanings.sent1: The sheetrocked wall looked smooth and clean.
meanings.sent2: The room felt cozy with the sheetrocked ceiling.
meanings.sent3: The sheetrocked room was so neat, it almost seemed fake.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sheetrocked as the freshly painted walls.
meanings.sent5: The sheetrocked surface gleamed in the sunlight, dazzling all who passed by.

meanings.sent1: They sheetrocked the entire basement over the weekend.
meanings.sent2: We sheetrocked the kitchen walls for a modern look.
meanings.sent3: He sheetrocked the treehouse, turning it into a cozy hideout.
meanings.sent4: The team sheetrocked the stage, preparing it for the performance.
meanings.sent5: After they sheetrocked the room, it felt brand new and inviting.
